Text:
CAN this help me to play desperados 2??
it says that I """""SecuROM? has determined that you are trying to start the application with an image of the original disc. Please be informed that SecuROM? protected applications will not work with an emulated image of the original disc. """"""
U can always remove the SF-drivers whit the StarForce Driver Removal Tool and/or manually-"http://www.glop.org/starforce/remove.php" and then reinstall the game if it doesnt work
PLEASE SOMEONE ENYONE PLEASE!!! SEED THIS MOFO!! :-}~
